mapper.sql: payment.py_id as payment_py_id, payment.pa_id as payment_pa_id, payment.py_type as payment_py_type, payment.py_qc as payment_py_qc, payment.py_mn as payment_py_mn, payment.is_bi as payment_is_bi, payment.py_class as payment_py_class, payment.py_mntime as payment_py_mntime
mapper.insert: insert into payment (pa_id, py_type, py_qc, py_mn, is_bi, py_class, py_mntime) values (#{paId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pyQc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pyMn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isBi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pyMntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

pa_id,

mapper.update:
update payment
pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
py_type = #{py_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
py_qc = #{py_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
py_mn = #{py_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_bi = #{is_bi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
py_class = #{py_class,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
py_mntime = #{py_mntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where py_id = #{py_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update payment set pa_id = #{pa_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, py_type = #{py_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, py_qc = #{py_qc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, py_mn = #{py_mn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_bi = #{is_bi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, py_class = #{py_class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, py_mntime = #{py_mntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where py_id = #{py_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) as py_qc from payment where pa_id=#{paId}
